projectGridLines.title: Business Analytics & Business Intelligence
projectGridLines.description:
•             Ability to analyze data and come up with metrics that will help in data driven decision making

•             Ability to transform & manipulate data using Power Query, SQL or Python

•             Visualize data by creating dashboards on Power BI

•             Excellent problem solving skills

•             Presenting insights/thoughts/results to stakeholders

•             Effective communication

•             Regular updates to senior leadership and stakeholders

Basic Mathematics, Statistics & Introduction to Computer Science

Experience in data analytics, SQL or Power BI required (interns are expected to have basic knowledge of Power BI)

During this project you will learn the following skills:

•             Problem solving & understanding of metrics

•             Advanced Analytical capabilities

•             Business understanding

•             Effective communication

•             Stakeholder Management
